features: Soothes Sensitive Skin: NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cooling Shave Gel is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin
Fights Shaving Irritation: This men's shave gel fights irritation from shaving, burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch
Improves Razor Glide: A beard shaving gel that improves razor glide and softens stubble for a comfortable, close shave
Chamomile and Seaweed Enriched: Enriched with natural Chamomile and Seaweed extracts, this NIVEA shaving gel for men to calm and leave skin feeling cool
Includes three (3) 7 ounce cans of NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cooling Shave Gel
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cooling Shave Gel. This NIVEA shave gel is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin to care for skin while you shave and give a gentle cooling sensation. NIVEA Sensitive Cooling Shave Gel for Men is enriched with natural Chamomile extract and Seaweed extract to calm and leave skin feeling cool. Great as an alternative to shaving cream, this shave gel helps to fight the five signs of shave irritation: burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch. Featuring Skin Guard Technology, this sensitive shaving gel improves razor glide to help protect against nicks and cuts. It also softens stubble for a comfortable, close shave. You can feel good about using this sensitive shave gel since it is dye free and alcohol free, making it safe for everyday use. NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cooling Shave Gel is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cooling Post Shave Balm and Sensitive Face Lotion as part of a daily skincare regimen. To use, pump men's shaving gel onto fingertips and massage directly onto face to form a rich, creamy lather.

Can you use this shaving gel with an electric razor? The NIVEA MEN shaving gels are not meant to be used with an electric razor. What is the color of this shaving gel? The NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cool Shaving Gel is bluish. It comes out light blue, and white from the foam as it forms. What does it mean that this shaving gel is free from drying alcohol? This NIVEA MEN shaving gel is free from drying alcohol, which means that it hydrates your skin and softens stubble for a close, comfortable shave. What ingredients are in this shaving gel?​ You can find a full list of the ingredients in NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cool Shave Gel on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page. Has the formula of this shaving gel changed? NIVEA MEN has been researching the best, safest and most effective skincare formulas for more than 100 years. We regularly analyze our existing formulas and make improvements as needed to ensure all products meet the highest quality standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chill Out with NIVEA Men Sensitive Cooling Shaving Gel - A Must-Have for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: As someone with sensitive skin, shaving has always been a bit of a nightmare for me. Redness, irritation, and razor burn were all too common after each shave, until I discovered NIVEA Men Sensitive Cooling Shaving Gel.This shaving gel is a game-changer. The cooling sensation is immediate and incredibly soothing, which helps to reduce irritation and redness. It's like a mini-spa treatment for your face. And the fact that it comes in a pack of three means I always have a backup on hand.The formula is also great. It's lightweight and doesn't clog up your razor, which can be a common problem with other shaving gels. It also foams up nicely, allowing for a close and comfortable shave. Plus, it's fragrance-free, so it won't compete with any cologne or aftershave you may choose to wear.But what really sets this shaving gel apart is the fact that it's designed specifically for sensitive skin. It's gentle enough that I can use it daily without worrying about irritation or breakouts. And I love that it contains ingredients like chamomile and seaweed extract, which are known for their calming and soothing properties.Overall, I highly recommend NIVEA Men Sensitive Cooling Shaving Gel to anyone with sensitive skin. It's the perfect solution for a smooth and comfortable shave without any of the irritation or redness. So go ahead, chill out with NIVEA - your skin will thank you.
